text:
[Verse]
Sun sets in the sky
Colors start to fly
Whispering goodbye
To the daylight high

[Verse 2]
Stars begin to show
Moonlight starts to glow
Night begins to flow
A magic we all know

[Chorus]
Dreams take wing tonight
Hearts dance in the light
Endless
Pure delight
Underneath the twilight

[Verse 3]
Waves crash on the shore
Moments we adore
As the night explores
Memories at its core

[Bridge]
Love's an endless stream
In this midnight dream
Silent as a beam
Of moonshine supreme

[Chorus]
Dreams take wing tonight
Hearts dance in the light
Endless
Pure delight
Underneath the twilight
title: Sunset Dreams
